argo.rules.rules.convert_rule_dicts_to_system_dicts module¶

Class for converting between dict and system-ready representations of rules

class argo.rules.rules.convert_rule_dicts_to_system_dicts.ConvertRuleDictsToSystemDicts(rule_dicts: dict, field_datatypes: dict, cassandra_field_names: dict)[source]¶

Bases: object

Converts a set of rules (each being represented in the standard ARGO dictionary format) into the system-ready format.

system_dicts¶

Set of rules defined using the system JSON format (values) and their system name (keys).

Type

dict

convert() → dict[source]¶

Converts a set of rules (each being represented in the standard ARGO dictionary format) into the system-ready format.

Returns

Set of rules defined using the system-ready format

(values) and their names (keys).

Return type

dict
